ComicInfo.Summary:
The story so far: Coincidence and fate collide as a serial killer and a family are brought together by a strange small creature that dwells in the world of THE GIFT. But before the family can fall victim to the killer's sick desires, the latest bearer of THE GIFT, Every Green, uses his power to save his family fro the evil machinations of the mischievous gremlin behind the killer's actions. The Ancient One watches these events from afar and once again begins his journey to find those who shall receive... THE GIFT.
Cover "model" Eliza Jane Schneider
